idea:
We at DearCows supply Indigenous Cow milk (A2 milk) at door step delivery through working with Bharwad community who take care our indigenous cows. A core aim of this venture is to educate more people about our own Indian Cow breeds. Instil a sense of pride, respect and care for these caregivers who nurture us just like our own mothers.

As a human, we are always taught to give back to the society and people who care for us. We adhere by those emotions, and thereby give Re. 1 for every litre consumed by you back to the Gwala communities to support activities related to Desi Cows.

For more information pl visit website www.dearcows.com
name: MUMBAI GWALAS PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: We are a healthcare company specialising in medical devices. We work at the intersection of technology and medicine to create personalised healthcare. Our current product is a mobility aid for Parkinson's Disease that helps improve gait.
name: LIFESPARK TECHNOLOGIES PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
Horizon Financial & Properties Advisers LLP is a provider of technological solutions and promotional platform for the real estate industry to launch their residential properties. 1stprelaunch.com is company’s online real estate listing platform for pre-launch residential properties also known by brand name “Horizon”. 1stprelaunch.com allows users to leave their required property specifications online and offer a wide range of services including identifying apartment options, organizing site visits, budget and affordability analysis, helping with unit selection and application filing with real estate developers to facilitate housing loans. Has presence in Mumbai and planning to expand other major cities in India.

With team size of 43 and 7 Partners, company is helping renowned builders in Mumbai to give success in pre-lauch of their projects and on the other hand buyers/investors get a trusted platform to get complete information and specifications of the project and its apartment.

Company’s main USP is, they are dealings only in luxury and best class projects and working for trusted builders. Hence, customers get reliance and assurity of quality apartments. Horizon team members are well versed with Indian real estate market and have profound experience to assist and advice customers at every step of buying process. Company maintain complete transparency with customers throughout the entire buying process.
name: HORIZON FINANCIAL & PROPERTIES ADVISERS LLP

idea: We are helping people build better mental health through an audio-based mobile platform. We will provide guided meditation sessions and other audios in native Indian languages.
name: HAPPYSOUL TECHNOLOGIES PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: Founded in August 2016, as a personal travel curator to people who wish to travel differently and effectively. Since, then we have worked with many clients/corporates providing the most thrilling, exhilarating, and offbeat holidays.
name: Bucket List Travels & Co

idea: Principle activities of ADVENTURENX LLP are all kind of adventure travel and leisure services including online aggregation of adventure activities and registration and payment platform for adventure activities and travels and tours services including ticketing, hotel booking, package tours, transportation and travel documentations, organizing of adventure and fitness trips and event and to provide consultancy services on personal and accident insurance.
name: ADVENTURENX LLP

idea: The benefits of learning music across different genres and ages, have been documented across generations by experts. Music is known to be the best mental gym. FSM Education Pvt Ltd, vision is to bring organized music education in our country , we have reached out to the best experts across the world and built a curriculum, backed with the right learning pedagogy using digital means to make it’s a highly scalable and accessible proposition for everyone in India. The teaching methods developed by the startup includes app based e-learning and practice module- "Furtados Music Buddy" which helps it deliver quality music education through verified and expert teachers. The startup has also created "High Furtados" app which is a discovery platform for certified music teachers.
name: FSM EDUCATION PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
Glimpse is google analytics for offline retail spaces. We use the existing CCTV cameras of a store to track each person visiting the store and their behaviour. On this, we provide a whole range of customer, operational and marketing analytics.

A short video explaining Glimpse: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=QdorhTOHXbI
name: BAZINGA SOFTTECH PRIVATE LIMITED
